an4.170:4.1: * Evaṃ me sutaṃ—​
an4.170:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.170:4.3: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4.170:4.5: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṃ.
an4.170:5.1: “Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti, sabbo so catūhi maggehi, etesaṃ vā aññatarena.
an4.170:6.2: Idha, āvuso, bhikkhu samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāveti.
an4.170:6.3: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:6.4: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:6.5: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāveti.
an4.170:7.2: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ samathaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:7.3: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:7.4: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti.
an4.170:8.2: Tassa samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4.170:8.3: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:8.4: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhuno dhammuddhaccaviggahitaṃ mānasaṃ hoti.
an4.170:9.2: Hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
an4.170:9.4: So taṃ maggaṃ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4.170:9.5: Tassa taṃ maggaṃ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṃyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4.170:10.1: Yo hi koci, āvuso, bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṃ byākaroti, sabbo so imehi catūhi maggehi, etesaṃ vā aññatarenā”ti.
